櫼字的基本解释

櫼
jiān
木楔。
木签：“扶衰每籍过眉杖，食肉先寻剔齿櫼。”
枓栱：“櫼栌各落以相承，栾栱夭蟜而交结。”

櫼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《集韻》將廉切，平鹽，精。］
(1)木楔；木签。
(2)屋上弓形短梁。即斗拱。

櫼字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫼； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页562第19
【說文】子廉切，音尖。楔也。【徐曰】卽今尖字。【戴侗曰】徐說非。櫼，古砧字。【長箋】櫼、殲當卽一字。【正字通】櫼、殲音義俱別，《箋》說誤。戴氏謂砧古文作櫼，亦誤。徐說通。○按《何晏·景福殿賦》櫼櫨各落以相承。櫼櫨對下欒栱，不作尖字解，可知徐說亦未爲是。《李善註》櫼卽枊也。枊與楔義近。　又【集韻】思廉切，音纖。又咨林切，音祲。義?同。　又【唐韻】所咸切。同檆。木名，似松。

櫼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
櫼字的起名意思

暂无。

櫼
Basic explanation of words
櫼
jiān
Wooden wedges.
Wooden sign: "Every time you use the eyebrow stick to help the decline, you will first look for the teeth to pick up the meat."
Yan Jiao: "Lan Jiaoyao meets each other with each other, and Luan Jiaoyao meets each other."
櫼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Jiyun" cuts Lian, flat salt, fine. ]
(1) Wooden wedge; wooden sign.
(2) Arch-shaped short beams on the house. That is Dou Gong.
櫼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫼; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 562 19
[Speaking text] Zilian cut, sharp sound. Wedge also. [Xu Yue] 卽 Today's sharp character. [Dai Dong said] Xu said wrong.櫼, the ancient anvil word. [Long Jian] The word "Ji" and "Jiandangxu". [Zhengzitong] "Jian" and "Jian" have different meanings, and "Jian" is wrong. Dai's claim that the ancient text of the anvil is made of 櫼 is also wrong. Xu said it all. ○According to "He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu", each of them will be connected to each other. Xia Lu did not make sharp interpretations to Xia Luan Xia, we can see that Xu said it was not true. "Li Shan's Note" 櫼卽枊also.枊 is close to wedge righteousness.　[Jiyun] Si Lianqie, sound fiber. Consulted Lin Qi again, the sound is awkward. Righteous? Same.　[Tang Yun] cut salty again. The same. The wooden name is like pine.
